name: Principle of Locality
description:
A simple physics-based 2.5D puzzle game with 8 levels made for Ludum Dare 37.

Each level is divided up into "rooms". Only one these is active at a time, selected by clicking on the room. Select rooms in the right order and move purple pieces around in order to navigate the white cylinder towards the flag.

I hope you enjoy playing it!

Credit:
